body_html:
@klauscc Yes, it seems that Hooks are packed in PerDevice so that TypeError is raised.

@iliTheFallen Thanks for your example. Unfortunately, the codes seems not self contained and I can't run it. It would be much useful for debug if the example could be verifiable.
